org.archive.wayback.resourceindex.ziplines

Interface BlockLoader

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GenericBlockLoader, HDFSBlockLoader, Http11BlockLoader, LocalFileBlockLoader, RemoteHttp11BlockLoader

    public interface BlockLoader

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] getBlock(String url, long offset, int length)
      Fetch a range of bytes from a particular URL.

    • Method Detail

      • getBlock

        byte[] getBlock(String url,
              long offset,
              int length)
                throws IOException
        Fetch a range of bytes from a particular URL. Note that the bytes are read into memory all at once, so care should be taken with the length argument.
        Parameters:
        url - String URL to fetch
        offset - byte start offset of the desired range
        length - number of octets to fetch
        Returns:
        a new byte[] containing the octets fetched
        Throws:
        IOException - on Network and protocol failures, as well as Timeouts
